summary: This bill, the Legislative Branch Appropriations Act, 2026, allocates funds for the operations of the U.S. House of Representatives, joint committees, the Capitol Police, Library of Congress, Government Publishing Office, Government Accountability Office, and other legislative branch entities. It covers salaries, expenses, building maintenance, and various programs. It also includes administrative provisions addressing cybersecurity, vehicle leasing, child care expenses, and restrictions on technology procurement. Further, the bill includes limitations on training and specifies the use of remaining funds after specific payments.
